channel.title: Mysql on Standing DevOps
channel.description: Recent content in Mysql on Standing DevOps

item.title: My MySQL Cookbook
item.description: Over the years I’ve been accumulating notes on how to do quick operations in a variety of technologies. These have been, up to now, for my eyes only, and they aim to be the documentation I wish I found online on how to quickly get something done in tech X. Today I decided to share some notes of one of those technologies: MySQL. Disclaimer: These notes are valid at the moment of writing and not for all versions of MySQL (I am testing 5.
